snippet: Fed officials believed last month that the conditions needed to trigger the first interest rate hike in a decade could “well be met” by December.
abstract: Stocks rise strongly as investors look to interest rates increase soon.
lead_paragraph: Fed officials believed last month that the conditions needed to trigger the first interest rate hike in a decade could “well be met” by December.

headline.main: Deal News and Fed Minutes Push Market Higher
headline.print_headline: Market Rallies on Rate Hints From Fed
